title: FS: T206 Raw: HOF, SL, Commons - ONLY 6 LEFT AS OF 8/9!
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Raw: HOF, SL, Commons - ONLY 6 LEFT AS OF 8/9!
posts.post_content:
Selling these as singles.  Take as many as you want at the prices below and simply add $2 to the total to ship.  If you want a better scan for any card, send me a PM.  From a technical standpoint, the max grade for any of these would likely be 35/2.5.
  
Ed Killian (Pitching):P150 - $22
Frank King:P350 - $38
Harry Sentz (Lentz):P350 - $55

[S]Pryor McElveen:P350 - $8[/S] - SOLD
